mapper.update:
update backend_user
user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update backend_user set user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userType = #{usertype,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_by = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from backend_user where user_code=#{user_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_password=#{user_password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
